meter_reading.notes: Odometer wheels clearly show 02271.1, which is 2271.1 cubic meters. The red needle is past the 0.03 mark and approximately 8/10ths of the way towards the 0.04 mark, indicating 0.038 hundredths. The M³ label and 0.01 mark are at the 12 o'clock position (0 degrees), and the needle's position at 0.038 translates to an angle of 100.8 degrees clockwise from 12 o'clock.
